TextEvent.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The TextEvent interface is a legacy UI event interface for reporting changes to text UI elements.

blockquote.para: TextEvent events have been superseded by events such as input, beforeinput, keypress, keyup, and keydown.

TextEventData.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The data read-only property of the interface returns the last character added to the input element.
TextEventData.value:
A string representing the event data.
For textInput events, this is the character that was last entered.

TextEventInitTextEvent.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The initTextEventEvent() method of the interface initializes the value of a TextEvent after it has been created.

remarks.para: This method must be called to set the event before it is dispatched, using .

blockquote.para: In general, you won't create these events yourself; they are created by the browser.
